title: Can Distributism Answer Game B's Questions? pt 8 Commutative & Distributive Justice, Working Models
description:
It is easy to rant about "economic injustice" but instead, let's talk about economic justice. We see what doesn't work, but we need to know what does work. Distributism is not utopian or impractical, we have working models of it in history and currently.

Mondragon Cooperative: https://www.mondragon-corporation.com/en/about-us/
Joel Salatin: Stacking Fiefdoms: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EbJc8i5B9RU
 
How to pronounce my last name: The "c" is silent just to confuse people.
Bringing Joseph Ratzinger (Benedict XVI) into the converZation in Paul VanderKlay's little corner of the internet.
Introduction to Christianity: https://amzn.to/2A5pvZi
Pope Benedict XVI writings:  https://w2.vatican.va/content/benedict-xvi/en.html 
Paul VanderKlay’s channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg 
Awakening from the Meaning Crisis (John Vervaeke): https://youtu.be/54l8_ewcOlY
John V. and PVK in conversation: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=65CcfvXXHug
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BqinRbjqy2c
Randos United: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEzWTLDYmL8soRdQec9Fsjw 
Me on Paul's channel:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o5q_5mVArNI
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EN-PQ3uUm4Y
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mSiXzJkIj0c
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WdlMtQSKszc
Karen Wong's channel, The Meaning Code: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgp_r6WlBwDSJrP43Mz07GQ
Sevilla King's channel, A Quality Existence: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6vg0HkKKlgsWk-3HfV-vnw  
Jonathon Pageau's channel, The Symbolic World: https://www.youtube.com/user/pageaujonathan/videos
